messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] ATT phones
messages.msgSnippet: They are newish and they are having BIG intro specials and you can usually find someone selling them in bigger malls in those little store fronts or those
messages.messageBody:
They are newish and they are having BIG intro specials and you can usually
find someone selling them in bigger malls in those little store fronts or
those little dohickies that are free standing.

Lynda

----------
> From: strandbe@...
> To: unschooling-dotcom@egroups.com
> Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] ATT phones
> Date: Sunday, June 04, 2000 6:58 AM
>
> <<Give her an ATT cell phone.>>
>
> Ooo, great idea! I didn't know they existed! I mean, I know cell phones
exist <BG>, but not that kind. I'll check into it....
>
> Thanks!
>
> Susan
